definition: (sitting) opposite/across (the street)/directly in front/to be face to face
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: It's diagonally across the street from the bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 它就在汽車站的斜對面。

sentences.english: The view is of the nondescript building across the street.
sentences.chinese: 風景就是對面街那不可名狀的建築物。

sentences.english: When I reached his table, I stood behind the chair across from him, unsure.
sentences.chinese: 我走到他的桌子旁，不太確定地站在他對面的椅子後。

sentences.english: And we sailed thence, and came the next day over against Chios;
sentences.chinese: 從那裏開船，次日到了基阿的對面。

sentences.english: Effects of rice bran addition on farinograph parameters of dough and quality of steamed bread were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了添加米糠對面糰粉質特性和饅頭品質的影響。

sentences.english: Employment interview is the process of transferring information between interviewers and interviewees.
sentences.chinese: 面試是面試官與應聘者進行面對面交流的過程。

sentences.english: The voyage lasted 46 minutes, from its departure in Philadephia to its landing across the Delaware River.
sentences.chinese: 從費城出發抵達特拉華河對面的旅程持續了46分鐘。

sentences.english: A Burmese Army base exists in Sang Hka and the 6th battalion of the KIA is situated opposite it.
sentences.chinese: 緬軍桑卡基地和克欽獨立軍第六營據點對面。

sentences.english: There is a grocery store over the road maybe you can find the juice there.
sentences.chinese: 路對面有家雜貨鋪，也許你能在那裏買到果汁。

sentences.english: Contact DetailsGuang Zhu Garden Building 1, Unit 5, Nan Ping, Zhuhai (opposite Hua Fa New Town Commercial Street - Janes Bar)
sentences.chinese: 珠海市南屏鎮華髮新城商業街對面廣珠花園1棟5號。

sentences.english: Located opposite the Workers' Stadium, between Dongzhimen and Gongtibei Road.
sentences.chinese: 位於工人體育館的對面，在東直們和工體北路之間。

sentences.english: RECEPTIONIST: The staff room is near the main entrance, on the left over there, just opposite the Reception desk.
sentences.chinese: 研究室在大門旁邊，在那左邊，諮詢處的對面。

sentences.english: I read this article to Izumi, who was sitting across from me.
sentences.chinese: 我把這篇報道讀給泉聽時，她正坐在我對面。

sentences.english: Yes, opposite the Chapelle de Braque.
sentences.chinese: 知道呀，就在布拉克小教堂對面。

sentences.english: The Burrow, we are told, is on the other side of the village from the hill.
sentences.chinese: 我們被告知，陋居在村莊的另一邊，山的對面。

definition: the back door/fig. under the counter (indirect way for influence or pressure)/anus
left/the left side/to the left of
suffix of a noun of locality
